body: 0—light; 1st—alter winds, animate rope, charm person; 2nd—cat's grace, entangle, protection from arrows, web, whispering wind; 3rd—cloak of winds, tongues, tree shape, wind wall; 4th—charm monster, hallucinatory terrain, minor creation, plant growth, river of wind, secure shelter, sirocco; 5th—command plants, fabricate, fickle winds, mirage arcana, sending, telepathic bond; 6th—battemind link, cat's grace (mass), tree stride; 7th—control weather, liveoak, scouring winds; 8th—charm monster (mass), euphoric tranquility, transmute metal to wood; 9th—control plants, refuge, winds of vengeance.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Wizard/Elemental Wizard Schools/Wood/Wood Elementalist Wizard Spells
name: Wood Elementalist Wizard Spells
